sources.title: Island Captives
sources.description: A businessman's daughter gets shipwrecked on a South Seas island with the son of the man who killed her father.

sources.title: Island Captives (1937) JUNGLE ADVENTURE
sources.description:
Stars: Edward J. Nugent, Joan Barclay, Henry Brandon 
 Director: Glenn Kershner

 A murdered businessman's daughter is shipwrecked on a jungle island with the son of the man who killed her father. Both are threatened by a smuggling ring that uses the island as its headquarters!

metadata.Plot: A murdered businessman's daughter is shipwrecked on a jungle island with the son of the man who killed her father. Both are threatened by a smuggling ring that uses the island as its headquarters.
metadata.Actors: Edward J. Nugent, Joan Barclay, Henry Brandon
